title: Bug 104630: Column icons not visible when connecting to a Derby database
OB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons are not visible in the application.
SR: To reproduce this issue, follow the steps below: 1. Create a new project. 2. Create a new report. 3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to the Derby database using the following details: Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui User Name: root Password: root 4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset. 5. In the Edit DataSet window, select the Query option. 6.
